analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status: 39 (Defensive). Momentum pushed the score from 41 down to 39, signaling a clear risk-off shift. The Macro Root is anchored in a firm DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) and a VIX at 20.6 (Fear/Volatility), which restricts upside potential. While widening High-Yield spreads suggest rising credit risk, stable net liquidity prevents a total systemic collapse. Conclusion: Prioritize capital preservation as a matter of urgency until the GMS score breaks back above the 40 threshold into Neutral territory.

reports.EN: GMS Status: 39 (Defensive). Momentum pushed the score from 41 down to 39, signaling a clear risk-off shift. The Macro Root is anchored in a firm DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity) and a VIX at 20.6 (Fear/Volatility), which restricts upside potential. While widening High-Yield spreads suggest rising credit risk, stable net liquidity prevents a total systemic collapse. Conclusion: Prioritize capital preservation as a matter of urgency until the GMS score breaks back above the 40 threshold into Neutral territory.
reports.ES: Estado GMS: 39 (Defensivo). El impulso empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n de 41 a 39, indicando un giro firme hacia la aversiÃ³n al riesgo. La raÃ­z macro se basa en un DXY (fortaleza del dÃ³lar/liquidez) sÃ³lido y un VIX de 20.6 (miedo/volatilidad), lo que restringe el margen de maniobra al alza. Aunque la ampliaciÃ³n de los diferenciales de alto rendimiento sugiere un aumento del riesgo crediticio, la liquidez neta estable evita un colapso total del sistema. ConclusiÃ³n: Es imperativo priorizar la preservaciÃ³n de capital hasta que el GMS supere los 40 puntos.

reports.ID: Status GMS: 39 (Defensif). Momentum mendorong skor dari 41 turun ke 39, menandakan peralihan kuat ke arah risk-off. Akar makro terpaku pada DXY (kekuatan Dolar/likuiditas) yang kokoh dan VIX di level 20.6 (ketakutan/volatilitas), yang membatasi potensi kenaikan aset berisiko. Meskipun pelebaran spread High-Yield mengisyaratkan peningkatan risiko kredit, level likuiditas bersih yang stabil saat ini mampu mencegah keruntuhan harga secara total. Tindakan: Prioritaskan pelestarian modal hingga indikator GMS menembus kembali angka 40 ke zona Netral.

reports.DE: GMS-Status: 39 (Defensiv). Das Momentum drÃ¼ckte den Score von 41 auf 39, was eine klare Risk-Off-Wende signalisiert. Die Makro-Basis liegt im festen DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke/LiquiditÃ¤t) und einem VIX von 20,6 (Angst/VolatilitÃ¤t), was das AufwÃ¤rtspotenzial begrenzt. WÃ¤hrend sich weitende High-Yield-Spreads auf steigende Kreditrisiken hindeuten, verhindert die stabile NettoliquiditÃ¤t einen systemischen Absturz. Fazit: Kapitalerhalt strikt priorisieren, bis der GMS-Wert nachhaltig Ã¼ber 40 in den neutralen Bereich steigt.
reports.FR: Statut GMS : 39 (DÃ©fensif). L'Ã©lan a poussÃ© le score de 41 Ã  39, signalant un passage marquÃ© au mode risk-off. La racine macro rÃ©side dans un DXY (force du dollar/liquiditÃ©) ferme et un VIX Ã  20,6 (peur/volatilitÃ©), limitant toute reprise immÃ©diate. Bien que l'Ã©largissement des spreads High-Yield (risque de crÃ©dit) suggÃ¨re une prudence accrue, la liquiditÃ© nette stable freine une capitulation totale. Action : Prioriser la prÃ©servation du capital tant que le score GMS ne franchit pas la barre des 40.
